name: Markdown blog
intro: Simple and lightweight theme with a strong focus on the beauty of typography. Powered by Markdown and Next.js.

title: About the project
paragraph: Simple and easy solution for your first blog with a support for multiple langauges (as many as you know them). Website is optimised and responsive and it comes with light and dark mode, easily customizable. Data is coming from the Markdown file that is located in the posts folder.

title: How does it work
paragraph: This project comes out of the box with the support for English (EN) and German (DE) languages. Data is located in posts folder which is aditinaly seperated by specific topic. Code is simple and easy to understand with customisation in mind. You can change colors, fonts and even languages that are supported with just couple lines of code.

name: ReachNow
description: In this era of plenty, where the large selection of public transportation services overloads many people, we helped Daimler and BMW join forces to unify all mobility options within one single platform: ReachNow.
